codeTemplate.name: Default-Hibernate-Xml
codeTemplate.template:
<#@ template language="C#v3.5" #> <#@ output extension="xml" #> <#@ assembly name="Microsoft.Unity.dll" #> <#@ import namespace="System.Collections" #> <#@ import namespace="System.Collections.Generic" #> <#@ import namespace="Microsoft.Practices.Unity" #> <# var assemblies = (IEnumerable<string>) Context["assemblies"]; #> <?xml version="1.0"?> <NHibernate xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Dialect>Sage.SalesLogix.NHibernate.SLXDialect, Sage.SalesLogix.NHibernate</Dialect> <ConnectionProvider>Sage.Platform.Data.DataServiceConnectionProvider, Sage.Platform</ConnectionProvider> <ConnectionDriver>NHibernate.Driver.OleDbDriver</ConnectionDriver> <CacheProvider>NHibernate.Caches.SysCache.SysCacheProvider, NHibernate.Caches.SysCache</CacheProvider> <CacheExpiration>120</CacheExpiration>
<hibernate-configuration xmlns='urn:nhibernate-configuration-2.2'> <session-factory> <property name="cache.use_query_cache">true</property> <property name="query.substitutions">true 'T', false 'F', True 'T', False 'F'</property> <property name="proxyfactory.factory_class">NHibernate.ByteCode.Castle.ProxyFactoryFactory, NHibernate.ByteCode.Castle</property>
<!-- Cache Settings -->
<!-- AccountSummary --> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Entities.AccountSummary, Sage.SalesLogix.Entities" usage="read-write" />
<!-- Account --> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Entities.Account, Sage.SalesLogix.Entities" usage="read-write" />
<!-- Contact --> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Entities.Contact, Sage.SalesLogix.Entities" usage="read-write" />
<!-- Opportunity --> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Entities.Opportunity, Sage.SalesLogix.Entities" usage="read-write" />
<!-- Ticket --> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Entities.Ticket, Sage.SalesLogix.Entities" usage="read-write" /> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Entities.TicketProblem, Sage.SalesLogix.Entities" usage="read-write" /> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Entities.TicketSolution, Sage.SalesLogix.Entities" usage="read-write" /> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Entities.Contract, Sage.SalesLogix.Entities" usage="read-write" /> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Entities.Urgency, Sage.SalesLogix.Entities" usage="read-write" /> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Entities.AccountProduct, Sage.SalesLogix.Entities" usage="read-write" />
<!-- Product --> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Entities.Product, Sage.SalesLogix.Entities" usage="read-write" />
<!-- Address --> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Entities.Address, Sage.SalesLogix.Entities" usage="read-write" />
<!-- LeadSource --> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Entities.LeadSource, Sage.SalesLogix.Entities" usage="read-write" />
<!-- PickList --> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.PickLists.PickList, Sage.SalesLogix.PickLists" usage="read-write" />
<!-- Activity --> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Activity.Activity, Sage.SalesLogix.Activity" usage="read-write" /> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Activity.Event, Sage.SalesLogix.Activity" usage="read-write" /> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Activity.ResourceList, Sage.SalesLogix.Activity" usage="read-write" /> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Activity.History, Sage.SalesLogix.Activity" usage="read-write" /> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Activity.UserCalendar, Sage.SalesLogix.Activity" usage="read-write" /> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Activity.UserNotification, Sage.SalesLogix.Activity" usage="read-write" />
<!-- UserInfo --> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Security.UserInfo, Sage.SalesLogix.Security" usage="read-write" />
<!-- OwnerRights --> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Security.OwnerRights, Sage.SalesLogix.Security" usage="read-write" />
<!-- Owner --> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Security.Owner, Sage.SalesLogix.Security" usage="read-write" />
<!-- User --> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Security.User, Sage.SalesLogix.Security" usage="read-write" />
<class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Security.UserProfile, Sage.SalesLogix.Security" usage="read-write" />
<!-- Role --> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Security.Role, Sage.SalesLogix.Security" usage="read-write" />
<!-- Plugin --> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.Plugins.Plugin, Sage.SalesLogix.Plugins" usage="read-write" />
<!-- SystemInformation --> <class-cache class="Sage.SalesLogix.SystemInformation, Sage.SalesLogix.System" usage="read-write" />
</session-factory> </hibernate-configuration>
<MappingAssemblies> <AssemblyName>Sage.Platform</AssemblyName> <AssemblyName>Sage.SalesLogix.PickLists</AssemblyName> <AssemblyName>Sage.SalesLogix.Plugins</AssemblyName> <AssemblyName>Sage.Saleslogix.System</AssemblyName> <# foreach (var asm in assemblies) { #> <AssemblyName><#= asm #></AssemblyName> <# } #> </MappingAssemblies> </NHibernate> <#+ [Dependency] public IDictionary Context { get; set; } #>
